```{r}
require(treelet)
require(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
x1 <- rnorm(100)
x2 <- x1*rnorm(100, 2, 2)
x3 <- x2*rnorm(100)
x4 <- x1*rnorm(100)
x5 <- rnorm(100)
x6 <- rnorm(100)
x7 <- rnorm(100)
x8 <- rnorm(100)

x_mat <- cbind(x1, x2, x3, x4, x5, x6, x7, x8)

x_cor <- cor(x_mat)

x_dist <- dist(x_mat, method="euclidean")

as.dist(x_cor)

hclust(as.dist(x_cor)) %>% plot()


```
